body_html:
I don't see how NCCL_EXTERNAL fixes anything, looks like in gloo NCCL_EXTERNAL is used just to set dependency if gloo is compiling its own nccl (which we don't want in any case).
https://github.com/facebookincubator/gloo/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=NCCL_EXTERNAL&type=

body:
I don't see how NCCL_EXTERNAL fixes anything, looks like in gloo NCCL_EXTERNAL is used just to set dependency if gloo is compiling its own nccl (which we don't want in any case).
